    The Film Blog

    Here's An Upcoming Gallery of Films Recommened By The Film Blog Staff.

    Thoughts On The Season: Lets talk about sleepers and Frontrunners By:Adam Hopkins

    Paramount is Test screening Babylon in the first week of November, The studio feels confident that this film will play to a bigger audience and could dethrone the current status of The Fablemans as a front runner.

    Charlotte Wells Aftersun is becoming a fall festival favorite the movie starring Paul Mescal and Frankie Corio in a powerful perfomance has been on festival radars for some time this will have a strong eventual winner for the Gotham Awards and The Independent Spirit Awards.

    We will have multiple interesting categories for International features and Animation. Mexico's sumbission of Bardo will contend outside of just international feature so this will garner production and writting and directing nominations.

    Most of the festivals are litmus tests before being condsidered strongly among the higher more influential academy and organizations such as the Baftas or BFI festival, But we are approaching a midpoint in the cycle where the public will have seen the major titles before the end of the year November has Banshees of Inisheer, Aftersun, She Said, and The Fabelmans. So we are getting to a midpoint but more movies are set to be released before the year's end.

    TFB.
